skills.name: Oozing Greatsword
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of increasing the duration of all [Poison] debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Heals this Champion by 2.5% of their MAX HP for each [Poison] debuff on the target.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 3.5 ATK

skills.name: Pestilence (Passive, Cooldown: 1)
skills.description:
Places four 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns at the start of each round. Has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn at the start of each turn.
[Active Effect] Whenever an enemy places a [Poison] debuff on this Champion, instantly removes it and replaces it with a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 2 turns instead.
